page.title: 07Employment in Yelden
page.content: In Yelden there is a coach company that has 2, 52 seater coaches. They take the children from the village to school at Riseley. They also take villagers shopping in Rushden on Wednesdays nd Fridays. There is a Tea-shop and an antique shop at the Red House. On the site of the old American Airbase there is a blacksmith, who as well as shoeing horses does all manner of metal work. The site is also shared by a carpenter who specialises in restoring old Gypsy caravans. At Smithy Cottage there is a small cattery and the owner also breeds silver tabbies. There is also a man who runs a precision engineering workshop in his back garden. AAccountancy Courses are run at the Manor, linked with a London business.
